docs.title: Termynal
docs.text: A lightweight and modern animated terminal window. Built for mkdocs.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Use <!-- termynal --> before code block

<!-- termynal -->

```
// code
```

or console in code block

```console
// code
```

// code

progress, prompt ---> 100%

```
$ show progress
---> 100%
Done!
```

show progress Done!

command, start with $

```console
$ command
```

command

comment, start with #

```console
# comment
```

comment

mkdocs plugin

...
plugins:
- termynal
...

Thanks ines
